import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { Editor } from "react-draft-wysiwyg"; import { EditorState } from "draft-js"; import "react-draft-wysiwyg/dist/react-draft-wysiwyg.css"; import 'hts-react-form/styles/default.css'; const Form = () => { const [editorState, setEditorState] = useState(() => EditorState.createEmpty() ); useEffect(() => { console.log(editorState); }, [editorState]); function handleSubmit(e) { e.preventDefault(); console.log(document.getElementById("emailbody").value); console.log(document.getElementById("emailbody").value); } return (
) } export default Form
